name: Giana Sisters DS [NDS]
description:
You will lead Giana on her greatest adventure yet and help find her glittering diamonds in a crazy dream world. Explore over 80 levels, meet fantastic characters and discover Giana's special abilities! Giana's dream world awaits you!

Features

• More than 80 levels.
• Explore a huge variety of items, bonus levels & hidden suprises!
